title: Is my friend a secret aristocrat? - Quora

response.answer_text: What an interesting friend you've got! Would you mind sharing how you met? We on Quora are curious! I think it's very likely she's an aristocrat. However, as someone else also pointed out, there are some things that don't match up with the general image most of us have of aristocrats. Mostly, they're known to dress in high-quality clothing that's modest and doesn't attract any attention to them. They're often taught the value of money and the vulgarity of showing off your wealth, so many of them may even shop at stores like the Gap, but perhaps spend a little more on something they find worthy, like a pair of hand-made Italian custom loafers. It's generally thought that their clothing must under no circumstances have visible designers labels, perhaps with the exception of a small Barbour or Ralph Lauren logo. Your friend dresses in designer labels. Do they have visible logos? It might be a tell-tale sign that she's "just" middle-to-upper-middle wanting to be aristocratic. Or, she might just be an aristocrat interested in fashion. It's hard to tell.
